scanner:source:scan.description: This utility will scan salesforce metadata (in source format) to identify any potential issues, this can be built into CI pipelines to ensure work admins are checking in is up to standard
examples:
$ sfdx config:scan --targetdir force-app --errorlevel 2
    Errors in the files have been identified

loglevel.name: loglevel
loglevel.description: logging level for this command invocation

resultsfile.name: resultsfile
resultsfile.description: The path to the file that the results should be written to

rulesetfile.name: rulesetfile
rulesetfile.description: The file path for the rule set that should be applied

targetdir.name: targetdir
targetdir.description: The directory that should be targeted whilst scanning the files

errorlevel.name: errorlevel
errorlevel.description: The level at which the severty should raise an error, otherwise the results will be logged silently. Numbers range between 1-5, where 1 is Minor and 5 is Extreme
